snippet: The fight to secure a place on the Oscar memorial list can be as contentious as trying to win an award, Alexander Wang teams up with Samsung to promote creativity and smartphones and whom to watch in this year's Grammy awards on Sunday.
abstract: The fight to secure a place on the Oscar memorial list can be as contentious as trying to win an award, Alexander Wang teams up with Samsung to promote creativity and smartphones and whom to watch in this year's Grammy awards on Sunday.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Oscar Race Beyond the Grave, and Crowdsourcing Design
